ABOUT ME

Hi, I’m Naomi! I’m a web developer with in-depth experience in UX Design. In a nutshell, I create websites that help organizations address business challenges and meet their needs. My expertise lies within front-end web apps, and the main languages in my tech stack are JavaScript, and of course HTML/CSS.

I'm a lifelong learner (currently taking a course on Data Structures and Algorithms), and I love to read, do yoga and explore new coffee shops around Toronto.
